snippet: LYDEN--Rose Marie, 80, on May 13, 2016. A resident of Naples, FL, formerly of Bridgehampton, NY. Beloved wife of John, mother of four and grandmother of 11. Donations may be made to: The Rose Marie Lyden Immokalee Scholarship Fund at St. John's University P.O. Box 7222, Collegeville, MN 56321. 1/3
lead_paragraph: LYDEN--Rose Marie, 80, on May 13, 2016. A resident of Naples, FL, formerly of Bridgehampton, NY. Beloved wife of John, mother of four and grandmother of 11. headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  LYDEN, ROSE MARIE
